content: Staff-Assisted Hemodialysis The Dialysis Care Center Staff-Assisted Dialysis program is designed to prioritize patients’ needs by offering them the opportunity to receive dialysis treatment in the comfort of their homes, given they meet specific eligibility requirements. The main difference between Staff Assisted Home Hemodialysis (SAHHD) and Home Hemodialysis (HHD) is that SAHHD doesn’t require patients to have someone like a Care Partner, Friend, or Family Member present during their treatments.
